name: Monstronto Labs - Veggie Deathtrap
description:
Help the wretched rejected hybrid vegetables escape from Monstronto Food's Experimental Vegetables Lab & Deathtrap in this masochistic 3D platformer.

Made in 50 hours for #HomeOfNerds game jam. Theme: "Dying is Good".

If you enjoyed the game, please vote for it here.

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows or WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Die: Hold Spacebar for 3 seconds
  • Restart At Last checkpoint: R
  • Quit: Escape
  • Skip to next checkpoint: / (forward slash)

Vegetables' deaths have the following noble sacrifices:

  • Tomato: Explode in a juicy red mess, shorting out any nearby electronics.
  • Corn: Burst in an explosion of popcorn, destroying any nearby crates.
  • Carrot: Fall dead and create a bridge that other vegetables can walk on.

Free Resources Used:

  1. Substance Share - for free textures/materials
  2. Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle & Soniss GDC 2016 Game Audio Bundle (Free, Royalty Free License)
  3. Universal Sound FX 2000 free sounds
  4. Fonts: Bebas Neue (100% free), Agreloy (Public Domain), and Schluber (100% free)
  5. Texturetastic Gray texture by Adam Pickering, free texture

Tools:Unity, Blender, Substance Painter, Audacity
